name: Applicability of part
text:
PART II.  ORGANIZATION OF BANKS, SAVINGS BANKS, SAVINGS AND
LOAN ASSOCIATIONS, TRUST COMPANIES AND DEPOSITORY
FINANCIAL SERVICES LOAN COMPANIES

 §412:3-200    The provisions of this part shall govern the organization of Hawaii financial institutions that are banks, savings banks, savings and loan associations, trust companies, and depository financial services loan companies. [L 1993, c 350, pt of §1]
